trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripBorder"></xref> event or the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripBackground"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripBorder"> </xref> evento ou <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripBackground"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you create a ToolStripRenderEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um delegado ToolStripRenderEventHandler, identifica o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
